name: sanctioned?
description: If is a possible sanctioned person (Be on the OFAC/ONU/INTERPOL/etc lists)

name: pep?
description: If the person is PEP (politically exposed person)

name: pep-risk
description: The risk associated to PEP person

name: preferred-name
description: Name the person prefers to be called

name: phone-code-area
description: Code area of the person's phone

name: street
description: Street name of the person's address

name: ref-point
description: Reference point of the person's address

name: cpf
description: Persons's CPF number (Brazilian social identification document)

name: cpf-status
description: Status of the person's CPF on Receita Federal

name: rg
description: Persons's RG number (Brazilian social identification document)

name: rg-creation-date
description: Creation date of the person's RG

name: rg-federation-unit
description: Federation unit where the RG was created

name: id-app-review-url
description: URL for the app review issued by the person

name: account-status
description: Bank account status (e.g active, canceled, blocked)

name: account-invitation-date
description: Date when the person received an invitation to become customer

name: member-since
description: Customer start date printed in the credit card

name: printed-name
description: Customer name printed in the credit card
